tbgitoo.tools

Class StatisticsTools

    Implements some common statistical functions on arrays

    thomasbraschler

    • Method Detail

      • getHistogram

        public static double[] getHistogram(int[] vals)
        Histogram Get the relative histogram of an array, using 0 to 255 value bins (as for greyscale image)
        Parameters:
        vals - array of values to be counted (must be within 0 to 255)
        Returns:
        Array of length 256, with relative frequencies for integer values between 0 and 255 found in vals

      • getQuantileFromValues

        public static double getQuantileFromValues(double[] val,
                                           double p)
        Estimate quantiles from observed values and a desired probability value. The quantile is such that a fraction of p realization are below the quantile. The function returns truncated quantiles in the sense that regardless of the value of p, the minimum value of the quantile is the smallest value in vals, and the maximum is the largest value in vals
        Parameters:
        val - Array of observed values
        p - Cumulative probability associated with the quantile
        Returns:
        Value of the quantile, with interpolation if not matching one of the values provided.

      • getQuantile

        public static double getQuantile(double[] hist,
                                 double p)
        Estimate quantiles from a histogram, the x-values assumed to be 0 to length(histogram)-1 (i.e. array index). The quantile is such that a fraction of p realization are below the quantile. The function returns truncated quantiles: if the p value is too small to be covered by the histogram midpoints, then -1 is return, if it is too large, length(hist) is returned
        Parameters:
        hist - Histogram of occurrence of values 0<=x<1, then 1<=x<2, ... (n-1)<=x<n
        p - Cumulative probability associated with the quantile
        Returns:
        Value of the quantile, with interpolation
